Only she couldn't go back to being nice and caring you know the type of harmless creature she was at the beginning because now she had a taste of entitlement. And now he stalks strip club hoping any of the young workers there will take his proposition and you know usually required a bouncer to get his ass off the grounds! I know I made multiple long-ass post so forgive me and just considered the first three as what I was trying to put up the story I compared this one too. I'm going to try to find that story so I'll post it later on where I found it and the name. But the only thing NTR here is that she's no longer just his girlfriend! Which is the really realistic part of this as I have heard stories of guys who got together with average-looking girls. In the very moment they became desirable to multiple men because those guys they completely changed into bitches! The conclusion was that they were only nice and gentle because nice and gentle is for the weak in some people's minds and I cannot dismiss that. You know taking into account the nice guys quote quote who really aren't nice they're just acting nice because it's a ploy to get sex. But as I pointed out there's a difference they're actually nice people and then there are those type of nice people who are only nice to lower people's guard. One story even ended up with the girl being abusive to the guy who helped her out when she was at her lowest. Once he left she didn't care as she had other men. But it didn't last long she had meaningless relationships and by the time the wall came she ended up going right back to how she used to be

Found it interesting 2 compared to two of them. but this one is different though because the ending pretty much makes it clear that and she's going to be playing her boyfriend around while she sleeps not just with senpai but it looks like all the contestants are going to be doing a gangbang at their party! The implication I'm guessing from this is Dad when she was average she was loyal and good but the moment she became beautiful and realize that she was desired by all the boys she got convinced why stick with just her boyfriend when she can have all the guys she wants. And I'm guessing our happiness is because the boyfriend apologized for upsetting her she now feels even more entitled. You know do usual she can get her sex from everyone else. And boyfriend just exist so she knows she's considered precious. Not a piece of meat and the usual because he loves me I can for a moment not recognized I become a whore! Basically she metamorph into a fake that she likely envied in the past

One even offered to get her something even better make it obvious it's laundry day she won't really like but then as already stated she's their shared woman at this point. So who the fuck cares what she thinks LOL. The story pretty much ends with those She Left Behind still worried for her but eventually moving on with a painfully obvious that the two of them might eventually date as the ex-boyfriend offers to go to a new BBQ joint with the ex-friend. Making it implied that he might pursue her now and she now sees our opening because you know they're not dating anymore they're not friends and the idiot even offered the both of them to each other on a silver platter so why not. The ending shows the guys having all collectively paid for a love hotels they have a gangbang well she mentioned she hasn't had her. And her in her inner thoughts come to the conclusion of why did she lose weight again? Meaning now she's pregnant and she forgot why she even lost weight to begin with!

When her boyfriend brought up how much she changed she got upset and compare him to her now ex-friend as well and being judgemental. I'm assuming her mind said now was since she had told the boys she didn't need her boyfriend anymore. So she broke up with him shamed him for being a chubby chaser and even told him that unknown to him. Their mutual friend actually had a crush on him but never pursued because while they were dating. But since he's such a chubby chaser they might as well get together then! In her mind it was supposed to look like she was shaming them both for not wanting to be the best like she was so they can stay losers. The irony of all this is that she gets the fancy clothes she desire to wear dirty when she has sex with the guys and they obviously show they don't give a damn about how she feels since you know she's at this point a prostitute to them for free.
